description: For years, the Meridian has been the benchmark against which other drysuits are measured. Durable GORE-TEX® Pro fabric and factory-sealed seams keep you reliably dry on every excursion. Reinforced seat and knee panels stand up to ambitious expeditions. The built-in relief zip means you don’t have to peel off your PFD, sprayskirt and suit to answer nature's call.GORE-TEX Pro is quiet, comfortable, and durably waterproof and breathable.Factory-sealed seams for waterproofness.Self-draining zippered chest pocket with key lanyard.Flap-protected nylon zipper for lasting waterproofness.Competition-cut underarms allow maximum freedom of movement.Self-draining neoprene cuffs over wrist and neck latex seals reduce abrasion and UV exposure.Dual-adjustment overskirt with a hook-and-loop-compatible neoprene waistband creates a watertight seal to sprayskirt tunnels.Adjustable bungee drawcord waist prevents bagging and sagging.Durable nylon waterproof relief zip.GORE-TEX Cordura-reinforced seat and knee inlaid panels for increased durability.Built-in GORE-TEX Pro socks fit over your favourite liner socks and under appropriate paddling footwear to keep your feet warm and dry.
name: Kokatat Gore-Tex Meridian Dry Suit - Men's
